{{disambig-more|The Hobbit|[[The Hobbit (disambiguation)]]}} {{book |title=J.R.R. Tolkien: ''The Hobbit'':
Drawings, Watercolors, and Manuscripts | image = J.R.R. Tolkien The Hobbit.jpg |author=([[J.R.R. Tolkien]]) |publisher=[[Marquette University]] |date=[[1987]] |format=Exhibition catalogue |pages= |isbn=0823906625 }} '''''J.R.R. Tolkien: The Hobbit: Drawings, Watercolors, and Manuscripts''''' is an exhibition catalogue which reproduces a variety of illustrations by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] for ''[[The Hobbit]]'' - both finished pieces and sketches. Less well known items include the original draft of the dustwrapper artwork and a manuscript page showing a "Map of the Upper River and Mirkwood". Also includes a letter to G.E. Selby and two essays: 'J.R.R. Tolkien: Pictures Fit for an Exhibition' by Curtis L. Carter and 'The Expectant Landscape: J.R.R. Tolkien's Illustrations for The Hobbit' by Richard Schindler.''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'', at Tolkienbooks.net {{references}} {{title|italics}} [[Category:Exhibition catalogues]] [[Category:Publications with contribution by J.R.R. Tolkien]] [[Category:Publications by title]]
